original_text: Hezekiah trusted the Lord, Israel's God. None of the other kings of Judah was like him, either before him or after him.
korean_text: 히스기야가 이스라엘 하나님 여호와를 의지하였는데 그의 전후 유다 여러 왕 중에 그러한 자가 없었으니

sentences.original_text: None of the other kings of Judah was like him
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 다른 왕들 중에는 그와 같은 이가 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: either before him or after him
